nodes.text: Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace Scrapbook
The Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace Scrapbook is the ultimate insider's guide to Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace.

Welcome to the beginning. Not so long ago, in a galaxy we call home... George Lucas created Star Wars, the most popular and successful film series of all time. Now comes the very first installment of this thrilling and imaginative saga, Episode I The Phantom Menace. Packed with over 100 photos, this scrapbook is you inside's guide to the fantastic wonders of Episode I. Get the facts behind the major characters, planets, weapons, aliens, ships, vehicles, and droids featured in the film. Discover fascinating details, meet the stellar cast, and even take a peek behind thee scenes of this unforgettable epic adventure
